trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Cedar Rapids
There were no other sightings in Cedar Rapids on or around May 17th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband went outside to have a cigarette I like to star gaze and it had been the first clear night for awhile, so as I was looking out front of my house towards the east I first saw a white, bright light fly across the sky I got excited and ran to see if I could see it better and yelled for my husband to come with me, by the time we got there it was gone, but kept looking up hoping to see it again. As we were watching for that something else appeared in the sky, it was almost see through, but was large circle shape with orange-red glow to it, it glided across the sky fast, but could follow it, it didn't make any noise, but could tell it was some sort of flying object, it was startling and we have no idea what it could have been. Weirdest thing I've ever seen!
